script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.Pirate.Base.AI.Special
script.description: Pirate Guild - Base AI : Decision Maker - Special Action

line.comment: * PG Base - Sub AI Script : Decide how to use funds
* Change (Nicoman35): Decision variables changed to strings for better code comprehensibility
* Get number of Pirate Guild frigates
* See, if there is a pleasure dome inside SECTOR
* Is this a secure sector for pirates?
* Determine, if this is a big base on account of fighter number
* Check, if THIS base already "owns" a mob boss
* Do not idle if plenty of cash
* Only one pleasure dome, and in secure sector only
* Check if max M7 is reached
* Check if it's wise to donate
* Check if we can build a boss
* Array is clean, let's pick an action
